attributes.action: Remove the permission in all Terms & Conditions for corporations to share Data.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to do so, because why should these big corporations need to share and/or sell our data amongst themselves, our personal lives do not have a price tag, they are worthless, the only time data should be shared is to the governing authorities.
attributes.background: Remove the permission in all Terms and Conditions for corporations to share harvested Data between themselves.

rejection.details:
Under new GDPR rules, organisations holding personal data must have a lawful basis for processing this data, including sharing it with a third party. For the sharing of data with a third party the lawful basis will normally be consent.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to prohibit companies holding personal data from sharing this in any circumstances, if that is what you want to happen.
